citations.narrative:
Five shelters in the outdoor enclosures had a dark, wet, moldy bedding covering almost the entire floor of the shelter. The
wet bedding was about an inch thick. There were 9 dogs in these enclosures. Mold, feces, dirt, and grime can harbor
organisms that can affect the health of the dogs. The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as
frequently as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces, to prevent soiling of the dogs, and to reduce disease
hazards.
Correction date: 25 June, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Five shelters in the outdoor enclosures had a dark, wet, moldy bedding covering almost the entire floor of the shelter. The 
wet bedding was about an inch thick. There were 9 dogs in these enclosures. Mold, feces, dirt, and grime can harbor 
organisms that can affect the health of the dogs. The licensee must ensure that cleaning and sanitization are done as 
frequently as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces, to prevent soiling of the dogs, and to reduce disease 
hazards. 
 
Correction date: 25 June, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
